https://www.openstreetmap.org/node/32149.reviewtext: I can t say enough good things about CityFit Finding a place to work on your personal health can be intimidating  CityFit is anything but Each instructor welcomes you and gets to know you by name from the first time you walk in the door And the other clients know it  they are friendly  not judgemental It is a great environment to be in  something they foster very well Don t hesitate  come to CityFit We want to meet you  Great instuctors  good community  and a solid workout I like how sore I am days afterward  but not sweaty after a barre class so I can fit it into my schedule without making it a big to do  Great little gym and lots of options through ClassPass The HIIT classes are my favorite  but I need to try others   Friendly small business specializing in Barre and other boutique fitness classes Small class sizes with one on one attention Reasonable prices  easy to schedule classes

https://www.openstreetmap.org/node/31018.reviewtext: Quality Fitness is an awesome place to go workout Trainers take the time and listen to you and help you achieve your fitness goals Very friendly vibe and the small group atmosphere allows extra attention to form and quality of the workout Absolutely love the personal training and feel I receive a challenging  quality workout every time Highest quality of training I have ever experienced  Employees are friendly and quickly learn your name Highly recommend  I love coming to Quality Fitness The classes are wonderful and the instructors are very encouraging  It s easy to feel motivated to show up to such a positive environment and I always get a great workout   I love the small classes It feels like you have your very own personal trainer  All of the instructors are awesome  If you are after personalized service  knowledgeable trainers and a really good yet safe workout  Quality Fitness is the place for you  I have been most impressed with the trainers  ability to customize one s work out experience with the utmost emphasis placed on injury prevention and overall fitness levels  Gentle Yoga is a great programPerfect for me  With limited mobility  the instructor was able to tailor it to my capabilities  Unfortunately I won t be able to continue It s a luxury I can t afford
https://www.openstreetmap.org/node/31018.webtext: Home Quality Fitness th Avenue West Building A Suite E Mukilteo WA Annual Food DriveHello everyone it s that time of year again for our Spring Food Drive This year marks the th Anniversary of the drive that Assistant Manager Dayna Baker started to benefit the Mukilteo Food Bank Each year gets better but we usually average about lbs of food and over donated ALL PROCEEDS go to the MUKILTEO FOOD BANK Checks are preferred to cash please make them out to the food bank and NOT to Quality Fitness You will receive a tax statement from the food bank for your donation Of course any donation of non perishable food is greatly appreciated You know you ave food in your pantry you ll never touchso pull it out and bring it in with you The Food Drive will be running until May th so hurry in before it ends Thank you for your support and participation Quality Fitness Staff Share Quality Fitness Mukilteo with Your Friends TONS OF CLASSES AVAILABLE Drop on in and check out our Group Training Personal Training Small Group Classes First Class is FREE Be sure to take a look at our Who Are We Quality Fitness Mukilteo offers small group classes and personal training in a family friendly and supportive environment Whether you want to relax in a meditation class improve your balance with yoga tone up with pilates build your strength with Circuit and TRX training build your stamina with Zumba and spinning or all of the above Quality Fitness Mukilteo is the place for you Persons of all fitness levels and abilities are welcome We are Dedicated to Helping You AttainYOUR FITNESS GOALS Congratulations to everyone who participated in the Tough Mudder on Saturday September th Tia Matthews Kristin Crandall Bryan Keller Todd Kamin Dillon Kamin Hunter Watkin Misty Watkins and Jennifer Yi awesome job All obstacles were completed and everyone finished as a team Looking forward to doing another one or something tougher next year Congratulations one more time to everyone what a great way to represent the gym and surrounding community Classes Per Week Choose one that fits your style or to see what s right for you Yoga Zumba Peak Performance Reformer Pilates Sculpt Stretch Spinning Indoor Cycling Circuit Strength Circuit Cardio Gentle Fitness Teen HIIT Fit TRX DEF CON You can also ask about Group Training Personal Training Youth Speed Camps Weight Loss Bootcamps Looking to sign up You don t have to even walk through the door to sign up for your next class Simply click on the My Account link in the upper right corner of the page and visit our Online Store From there just select the option you d like to buy ie Group Training Studio Classes Unlimited Memberships etc If you have any questions don t hesitate to Contact Us And did we mention we have absolutely NO ENROLLMENT FEES Personal Attention No Joining Fees Quality Fitness All rights reserved

https://www.openstreetmap.org/node/44149.webtext: EMS Fitness Canada Home EMS FITNESS FIRST INTERNATIONAL EMS STUDIO IN CANADA NEW WAVE OF FITNESS GYM WITHOUT WEIGHTSTRY IT NOW FIRST SESSION FOR FREE WITHOUT COMMITMENT EMS Electrical Muscle StimulationGet in great shape easy and fast Just minutes workout twice a weekUp to times more effective than regular GYM workoutIn our studio we combining skilled personal training with EMS technologyto provide the ultimate fitness solution in just minutes Call now to book your first free session without commitment Electrical Muscle Stimulation EMS is the elicitation of muscle contraction using electric impulses Does it sound too scientific EMS can be used as a training tool and as a beautifying toolThe impulses are generated by a device and delivered through electrodes on the skin directly above the muscles to be stimulated The impulses cause the muscles to contract so the result is similar to the actual movement of the muscles It s the st century training EMS training Save timeAs all muscles work simultaneously you ll spend just minutes with training Build musclesThe electrodes are placed directly on the body to each important muscle group so all the impulses reach their target It s easy and you can t go wrong Relieve back problemsAs there are electrodes built into the training suit along the spinal column those rarely trained muscles get worked as well So muscles get stronger which can lead to the relief of back problems Achieve optimal body fatSince it is an effective strengthening workout it transforms how the body uses up caloriesIt is a very effective tool for weight loss and fat removal Relieve joints stressThe electric impulses work on the muscles directly there is no pressure on the joints so they are not over worked as it is often the case with weight workouts Balance out the muscular systemThe built in electrodes can stimulate and develop all the muscle groups or just selected ones if desired so the otherwise weaker links of the body can be strengthened Your posture will improve as well as the way you feel the electricimpulse stimulation works on the deeper muscles tooThe blood circulation of the muscular and connective tissues will beenhanced which leads to a firmer more toned skin What an effectiveanti cellulite treatment The muscle workout makes bones stronger so they are more resistantto fractures and indirectly helps avoid osteoporosis A video posted by Karim Benzema karimbenzema on Sep at am PDT WE D LOVE TO HEAR FROM YOUPHONE EMAIL INFO EMSFITNESSCAADDRESS JANE ST https://www.openstreetmap.org/node/53895.reviewtext: I can t say enough good things about CityFit Finding a place to work on your personal health can be intimidating  CityFit is anything but Each instructor welcomes you and gets to know you by name from the first time you walk in the door And the other clients know it  they are friendly  not judgemental It is a great environment to be in  something they foster very well Don t hesitate  come to CityFit We want to meet you  Great instuctors  good community  and a solid workout I like how sore I am days afterward  but not sweaty after a barre class so I can fit it into my schedule without making it a big to do  Great little gym and lots of options through ClassPass The HIIT classes are my favorite  but I need to try others   Friendly small business specializing in Barre and other boutique fitness classes Small class sizes with one on one attention Reasonable prices  easy to schedule classes

https://www.openstreetmap.org/node/12931.reviewtext: Great hockey programs The coaches do a great job and the facility is one of the best in San Diego  This is the only rink I know of that has a full set of bleachers for the parents to sit at  All the other rinks have uncomfortable stools or you have to stand  The facility is one of the older ones in San Diego but  they ve been making upgrades and the newer facilities don t compare  They even have an electric Zamboni  Its pretty good here but make sure you ask for sharp skates There have been multiple times where I need to change out my skates cause they give me dull ones A bit pricey to get in  it used to be    bucks now its     The atmosphere is nice  there is a food court overlooking the rink Prices at the rink itself are exorbitant For example     for   hour use of a learn to skate assistance toy That said  my  y o daughter had the TIME OF HER LIFE riding one of them with her uncle  who can skate  and skate well  pushing her around  very nice lots of seating room and area kept nice  skates can only be wore for so long they are very stiff and hard  my wife and i had hurt ankles and feet at the end of the day  the ice is very wet so expect to be wet if you fall  Place is a great place It s just so busy  And the price is pretty expensive I don t think its worth it to go to a busy place for the price

https://www.openstreetmap.org/node/38989.name: Fitness First
https://www.openstreetmap.org/node/38989.reviewtext: Excellent helpful staff All equipment and machines are well maintained The place is quite big and never too crowded  Definitely recommend going here  I signed a    month contract here and after the contract was up they continued  to charge me claiming that I was on a month to month contract Now  if we take more than   seconds to think about this  we will realize that month to month and contract are   different things Furthermore  when I googled the gym to get their phone number to inquire about this  the first link to pop up was the Better Business Bureau s website was the first result Evidently they have several complaints against them   When I finally got a hold of someone  they claimed I never called to cancel my month to month contract  you know  the one I never signed    I had to call my credit card company to get the money back What does Capital One s customer service agent say to me    You re not the first person to call me about this establishment   My advice   exercise outside There are plenty of roads for running and plenty of heavy things to lift   When you get home   pour yourself a glass of Lagavulin    Whiskey Then cook a thick flank steak on a cast iron skillet seasoned in salted butter   Ron Swanson  I have been a member of FF for more than    years I got an extension so that my account was on hold because of an injury I had for a car accident I decided to cancel a week ago Now they are saying that I never got a hold and that I have to pay for the past five months and that they have been trying to reach me many times but this is not true I did call back once when they called me but they didn t return my call They said this is not possible because this is a business and that they would be available to return the call But this is not true because I have tried to call them many times in the past about other issues and the person did not return my call On top of that  I found out that they were charging me more than they did for new customers  The email that they just sent was very nasty Phone records show that they did not call  Solid  basic gym Nothing too fancy  but it has all the free weights and machines I need However  if you re looking for a high end  pretty gym  look elsewhere  Ladies room showers always have mold in the stalls Very limited pieces of popular equipment Not customer centric Management rude Pay more and go to a well equipped  customer friendly gym It is possible that this is the best they can do because the building will be torn down and replaced with new residential and commercial spaces

https://www.openstreetmap.org/node/46997.webtext: Frankfurt am Main Grillpl tze Springe direkt zu Sie sind hier Grillpl tze Themennavigation Grillpl tze Gem der Gr nanlagensatzung der Stadt Frankfurt am Main in ihrer jeweils g ltigen Fassung ist das Grillen in ffentlichen Gr nanlagen nur an eigens hierf r ausgewiesenen Pl tzen erlaubt Die Grillpl tze in den ffentlichen Parks und Gr nanlagen k nnen weder reserviert noch angemietet werden Sie stehen allen B rgerinnen und B rgern zur Verf gung Die Grillpl tze der ffentlichen Gr nanlagen haben in der Regel keine Grillvorrichtung Sitzm glichkeiten sind nur beschr nkt oder nicht vorhanden dh Sie m ssten sich Ihren eigenen Grill sowie Sitzgelegenheiten mitbringen Ausnahmen hiervon bilden die Grillpl tze innerhalb der Waldspielparks Scheerwald und Schwanheim Strom und Wasser stehen in ffentlichen Gr nanlagen nicht zur Verf gung Musik spielen ist in ffentlichen Gr nanlagen nur in dem Ma e erlaubt dass sich kein anderen Nutzerinnen und Nutzer bel stigt f hlt Das Zufahren mit Fahrzeugen ist nicht gestattet F r die Entsorgung von Asche und Glut steht ein gesonderter Beh lter zur Verf gung f r den Restm ll steht eine M lltonne bereit Beide Entsorgungsm glichkeiten befinden sich in der n heren Umgebung Um die Grillpl tze f r alle k nftigen Nutzerinnen und Nutzern in einem sauberen Zustand zu erhalten bitten wir Sie Ihren M ll nach Beendigung mitzunehmen und ordnungsgem zu entsorgen In der unten angegebenen Adressliste sind alle ffentlichen Grillpl tze aufgef hrt jeweils mit einem entsprechenden Link auf die Lage im Stadtplan Zus tzlich finden Sie in der rechten Spalte eine Stadtplan bersicht mit allen farbig gekennzeichneten Grillpl tzen Ausgehend vom Grillplatz Ostpark k nnen Sie durch Scrollen im Plan oder Klicken auf
